content:
Yes, many natural candle brands offer lavender-scented candles. Here are a few options you can consider:

1. P.F. Candle Co. - offers a lavender-scented candle called "Lavender," made with essential oils. 2. Brooklyn Candle Studio - has a lavender-scented candle called "Lavender Noir," made with natural essential oils and soy wax. 3. Lite+Cycle - has a lavender-scented candle called "Grounding," which is made with certified organic lavender essential oil and organic coconut wax. 4. Boy Smells - has a lavender-scented candle called "Lanai," made with natural essential oils and coconut and beeswax. 5. Keap - offers a lavender-scented candle called "Amalfi Coast," made with organic coconut wax, lavender essential oil, and bergamot. Keep in mind that scent preferences are subjective, so it's always a good idea to read reviews before purchasing a new candle to ensure that the scent is to your liking.
